body.raw: {"languageDetection":{"language":"ENGLISH","strategy":"NONE"},"text": "The prices of essential goods such as flour, oil and sugar have considerably gone up in Tajikistan, privately-owned Asia-Plus news agency reported on 16 January . \rThe prices roused the indignation of customers, while sellers complain about the growth of the US dollar rate, the agency said. The rapid increase of prices for wheat flour and butter is something that the population is concerned over the most, the agency said. /nAccording to residents, the prices for everything - cigarettes, tea, coffee, sweets, sugar and other goods - have risen approximately by 30-40 per cents, the agency said. Prices for office machines and equipment, medicine, clothing, shoes and even office supplies also noticeably went up. /n However, the prices of locally produced goods - meat, eggs, milk, vegetables and fruits - have so far remained as before. /n The agency mentioned that over the past one year, the national currency, somoni, depreciated by 40 per cent against the dollar. /n The concern over the rising prices in Tajikistan is increasing, while over 30 per cent of Tajikistan's population is living under the poverty line, having only one bread-winner in the family, the agency said. /n Meanwhile, in 2015 the authorities did not fulfill their promise to raise salaries of employees of budget organizations, pensions and benefits, referring to financial problems. /n The agency said that the price hike of basic products primarily hit hard the budget of vulnerable people - the disabled, pensioners, single mothers and state employees. /n The salary is enough only for the payment of the flat rent and communal services, the agency quoted a local resident, who was complaining about the mounting prices, as saying. /n The families of migrants, who lived in better conditions last year, are now experiencing the same problems as others, the agency added."}

response.name: Sample 1

body.raw: {"languageDetection":{"language":"ENGLISH","strategy":"NONE"},"text":"what a fantastic day for a BBQ. We have some great wines open for such an occassion #VillaNeuvaMalbec - excellent body, fruity!"}

We have some great wines open for such an occassion #VillaNeuvaMalbec - excellent body, fruity!","Tokens":["what","a","fantastic","day","for","a","BBQ",".","We","have","some","great","wines","open","for","such","an","occassion","#","VillaNeuvaMalbec","-","excellent","body",",","fruity","!"],"Stopword":[0,1,5,9,10,15,16],"ScriptRegion":[0,127,215]}}]}
